results.title: S-AMLODIPINE AS A MODERN EFFECTIVE ANTIHYPERTENSIVE AND AN ANTIANGINAL AGENT.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Results: This study shows the high clinical effectiveness of the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@S-amlodipine@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@arterial hypertension@@@ associated with @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@coronary artery disease@@@.

results.title: Cardio classics revisited: focus on the role of amlodipine
results.text_hl: However in the CAMELOT study, which compared @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ vs placebo in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@coronary artery disease@@@ but with normal blood pressure, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ was shown to be associated with a reduced risk of adverse cardiovascular events.

citations.NLM: Owen AJ, Reid CM. Cardio classics revisited: focus on the role of amlodipine Integr Blood Press Control. 2012;5():1-7. PMID: 22346362
citations.BibTeX: @article{22346362, title={Cardio classics revisited: focus on the role of amlodipine}, author={Owen AJ and Reid CM}, journal={Integr Blood Press Control}, volume={5}, pages={1-7}}
